resources.string: This application was created using Android Studio using the Java programming language, the contents of the movie list content using a recycler view taken from the JSON api using volley assisted by using the singletron pattern. then there is the localization feature where the localized language will follow the rating language, then you can login and register using your email and password so that this application can save the movies you like with the added feature of the Liked Movies feature using the SQLite Database. so, have fun!
